overview: Mat Gedebe, a man of violent temper but good moral character. He lives with his mother and sister. No one cares about Mat, he is often left out. One day, a beautiful female teacher, Teacher Murni appeared, which attracted the whole village. But not for Matt Gedebe, he doesn't care. Until the accident, Teacher Murni was assisted by Mat Gedebe. Ever since that incident, Mat Gedebe has become the focus of Teacher Murni and Teacher Murni feels that Mat Gedebe is a good young man despite his fierce appearance.
title: Mat Gedebe
